timeline.message: Provides a SOAP client which tracks all calls as events.
Logs all executed SQL statements in production systems.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Record a SOAP call performed by {@link sirius.biz.util.MoniRemoveDeletedEntitiesLooptoredSOAPClient}.
          
          
            
             * Record a SOAP call performed by {@link sirius.biz.util.MonitoredSOAPClient}.
timeline.author: sabieber

timeline.message:
Always logs all execute SQL statements.

This is neither invoked in tests, nor are there many executions in dev systems.
Merge branch 'aha/soap' of https://github.com/scireum/sirius-biz into aha/soap
Updates to the latest apache mina SSH dependencies.
